page.title: 17CHILDREN AT PLAY IN SALTBURN
page.content: We carried out a survey and found out how children used their spare time. {GAMES:}Games played include Bull Dog, Mr.Crocodile, Donkey, Two Ball and Kiss Catch. These are mainly played at school with the rules being decided by those joining in. Elastics is a game played by at least 3 people. A long piece of elastic is tied together. Two people stand inside both ends while others take turns to jump over and on the elastic placed at various heights. Different tricks are then performed as the game progresses. {HOBBIES:}Most children went fishing while others collected things such as stamps, dolls, comics, badges and posters. Outside hobbies included bird watching, car and train spotting. {SPORTS:}Football was very popular as well as rounders, tennis, swimming, cricket and Danish Longball.
